inclusion.criterion: age ranged from eight to fifteen years
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: communication problems such as intellectual disability, autism, Down syndrome, or cerebral palsy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: any neurological and/or musculoskeletal disorders which influence postural stability
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome and was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids. He has a history of vaccination.
